task: Write a comprehensive research document about the future of AI. Include deep research on: 1) Current state of AI technology and major breakthroughs 2) Emerging trends and developments in AI research 3) Potential societal impacts and ethical considerations 4) Future applications and possibilities 5) Challenges and limitations 6) Expert predictions and timelines. Use academic sources and recent research papers. Format the document with clear sections, citations, and a bibliography.
